author: Cat Bussell
description:
Not one, but two of the most elusive cards in the new Magic: The Gathering Final Fantasy set have been found on its very first weekend. As much as it would be a pleasure in any circumstance to open a card depicting one of Final Fantasy’s iconic feathered bipeds, these golden Chocobo cards are a cut above the rest.

Continue reading Two ultra-rare MTG Final Fantasy golden Chocobos spotted in the wild already
MORE FROM WARGAMER: All MTG sets in order, Upcoming MTG release dates, How to play MTG
title: Two ultra-rare MTG Final Fantasy golden Chocobos spotted in the wild already
